branchCategory.name: VFM

branchItem.name: 200 Series
300 Series
XT34-60/67, Foot Pedal Type
branchItem.description: <p>5 port foot pedal type mechanical valve with and without lock options.&nbsp; The XT34-60 with lock weighs 0.8kg while the XT34-67 without lock weighs 0.5kg.&nbsp; The XT34 has an ambient and fluid temperature -5 to 60<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&deg;C.</span></p>
